verses.verse: Also I in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4075>Mede,<s%> even I, <S%H5975>stood<s%> to <S%H2388>confirm<s%> and to <S%H4581>strengthen<s%> him.

And <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H571>truth.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in <S%H6539>Persia;<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> shall be <S%H1419>far<s%> <S%H6238>richer<s%> than they <S%H3605>all:<s%> and by his <S%H2394>strength<s%> through his <S%H6239>riches<s%> he shall <S%H5782>stir<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> against the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of <S%H3120>Grecia.<s%>

And a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up, that shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> with <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4474>dominion,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will.<s%>

And when he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up, his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and shall be <S%H2673>divided<s%> toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and not to his <S%H319>posterity,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> according to his <S%H4915>dominion<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H4910>ruled:<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H5428>plucked<s%> up, even for <S%H312>others<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H428>those.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and one of his <S%H8269>princes;<s%> and he shall be <S%H2388>strong<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> him, and have <S%H4910>dominion;<s%> his <S%H4474>dominion<s%> shall be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

And in the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall <S%H2266>join<s%> themselves together; for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4339>agreement:<s%> but she shall not <S%H6113>retain<s%> the <S%H3581>power<s%> of the <S%H2220>arm;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H5975>stand,<s%> nor his <S%H2220>arm:<s%> but she shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> up, and they that <S%H935>brought<s%> her, and he that <S%H3205>begat<s%> her, and he that <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> her in these <S%H6256>times.<s%>

But out of a <S%H5342>branch<s%> of her <S%H8328>roots<s%> shall one <S%H5975>stand<s%> up in his <S%H3653>estate,<s%> which shall <S%H935>come<s%> with an <S%H2428>army,<s%> and shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4581>fortress<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> against them, and shall <S%H2388>prevail:<s%>

And shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> with their <S%H5257>princes,<s%> and with their <S%H2532>precious<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and of <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and he shall <S%H5975>continue<s%> more <S%H8141>years<s%> than the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his own <S%H127>land.<s%>

But his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall be <S%H1624>stirred<s%> up, and shall <S%H622>assemble<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2428>forces:<s%> and one shall certainly <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H7857>overflow,<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> through: then shall he <S%H7725>return,<s%> and be <S%H1624>stirred<s%> up, even to his <S%H4581>fortress.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be moved with <S%H4843>choler,<s%> and shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with him, even with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north:<s%> and he shall <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H5975>forth<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> but the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And when he has <S%H5375>taken<s%> away the <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up; and he shall <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> many <S%H7239>ten<s%> <S%H7239>thousands:<s%> but he shall not be <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> by it.

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and shall <S%H5975>set<s%> forth a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7223>former,<s%> and shall certainly <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H6256>certain<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and with much <S%H7399>riches.<s%>

And in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> there shall <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south:<s%> also the <S%H6530>robbers<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5375>exalt<s%> themselves to <S%H5975>establish<s%> the <S%H2377>vision;<s%> but they shall <S%H3782>fall.<s%>

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H8210>cast<s%> up a <S%H5550>mount,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> the most <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall not <S%H5975>withstand,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> his <S%H4005>chosen<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> shall there be any <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H5975>withstand.<s%>

But he that <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> him shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his <S%H7522>own<s%> <S%H7522>will,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> which by his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>

He shall also <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> with the <S%H8633>strength<s%> of his <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> ones with him; thus shall he <S%H6213>do:<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> him the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H7843>corrupting<s%> her: but she shall not <S%H5975>stand<s%> on his side, <S%H3808>neither<s%> be for him.

After this shall he <S%H7725>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H339>isles,<s%> and shall <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H7227>many:<s%> but a <S%H7101>prince<s%> for his own behalf shall cause the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> offered by him to <S%H7673>cease;<s%> <S%H1115>without<s%> his own <S%H2781>reproach<s%> he shall cause it to <S%H7725>turn<s%> on him.
Then he shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4581>fort<s%> of his own <S%H776>land:<s%> but he shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and not be <S%H4672>found.<s%>

Then shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up in his <S%H3653>estate<s%> a <S%H5674>raiser<s%> of <S%H5065>taxes<s%> in the <S%H1925>glory<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom:<s%> but within <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> he shall be <S%H7665>destroyed,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

And in his <S%H3653>estate<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up a <S%H959>vile<s%> person, to <S%H5921>whom<s%> they shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1935>honor<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom:<s%> but he shall <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H7962>peaceably,<s%> and <S%H2388>obtain<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> by <S%H2519>flatteries.<s%>

And with the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of a <S%H7858>flood<s%> shall they be <S%H7857>overflowed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and shall be <S%H7665>broken;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And after the <S%H2266>league<s%> made with him he shall <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully:<s%> for he shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up, and shall <S%H6105>become<s%> <S%H6105>strong<s%> with a <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H1471>people.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H7962>peaceably<s%> even on the <S%H4924>fattest<s%> places of the <S%H4082>province;<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H1>fathers<s%> have not <S%H6213>done,<s%> nor his <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1>fathers;<s%> he shall <S%H967>scatter<s%> among them the <S%H961>prey,<s%> and <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H7399>riches:<s%> yes, and he shall <S%H2803>forecast<s%> his <S%H4284>devices<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4013>strong<s%> <S%H4013>holds,<s%> even for a <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5782>stir<s%> up his <S%H3581>power<s%> and his <S%H3824>courage<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be <S%H1624>stirred<s%> up to <S%H4421>battle<s%> with a <S%H5704>very<s%> <S%H3960><s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army;<s%> but he shall not <S%H5975>stand:<s%> for they shall <S%H2803>forecast<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him.

Yes, they that <S%H398>feed<s%> of the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of his <S%H6598>meat<s%> shall <S%H7665>destroy<s%> him, and his <S%H2428>army<s%> shall <S%H7857>overflow:<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> down <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

And <S%H8147>both<s%> of these <S%H4428>kings'<s%> <S%H3824>hearts<s%> shall be to do <S%H4827>mischief,<s%> and they shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3576>lies<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7979>table;<s%> but it shall not <S%H6743>prosper:<s%> for <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be at the time <S%H4150>appointed.<s%>

Then shall he <S%H7725>return<s%> into his <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7399>riches;<s%> and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> exploits, and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his own <S%H776>land.<s%>
At the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> he shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south;<s%> but it shall not be as the <S%H7223>former,<s%> or as the <S%H314>latter.<s%>

For the <S%H6716>ships<s%> of <S%H3794>Chittim<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> against him: therefore he shall be <S%H3512>grieved,<s%> and <S%H7725>return,<s%> and have <S%H2194>indignation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> so shall he <S%H6213>do;<s%> he shall even <S%H7725>return,<s%> and have <S%H995>intelligence<s%> with them that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And <S%H2220>arms<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on his part, and they shall <S%H2490>pollute<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H4581>strength,<s%> and shall <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice, and they shall <S%H5414>place<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> that makes <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>

And such as do <S%H7561>wickedly<s%> against the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall he <S%H2610>corrupt<s%> by <S%H2514>flatteries:<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> that do <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> exploits.

And they that <S%H7919>understand<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H995>instruct<s%> <S%H7227>many:<s%> yet they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by <S%H3852>flame,<s%> by <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and by <S%H961>spoil,<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Now when they shall <S%H3782>fall,<s%> they shall be <S%H5826>helped<s%> with a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5828>help:<s%> but <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H3867>join<s%> to them with <S%H2519>flatteries.<s%>

And some of them of <S%H7919>understanding<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall,<s%> to <S%H6884>try<s%> them, and to <S%H1305>purge,<s%> and to make them <S%H3835>white,<s%> even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H5750><s%> it is <S%H5750>yet<s%> for a time <S%H4150>appointed.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will;<s%> and he shall <S%H7311>exalt<s%> himself, and <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H410>god,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> things <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H410>gods,<s%> and shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> be <S%H3615>accomplished:<s%> for that that is <S%H2782>determined<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall he <S%H995>regard<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> nor the <S%H2532>desire<s%> of <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H995>regard<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H433>god:<s%> for he shall <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all.<s%>

But in his <S%H3653>estate<s%> shall he <S%H3513>honor<s%> the <S%H433>God<s%> of <S%H4581>forces:<s%> and a <S%H433>god<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> his <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not shall he <S%H3513>honor<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and with <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H2530>pleasant<s%> things.

Thus shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H4581>most<s%> <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H4013>holds<s%> with a <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H433>god,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> and <S%H7235>increase<s%> with <S%H3519>glory:<s%> and he shall cause them to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H7227>many,<s%> and shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H4242>gain.<s%>

And at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H5055>push<s%> at him: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H8175>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him like a <S%H8175>whirlwind,<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and with <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H591>ships;<s%> and he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H776>countries,<s%> and shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>enter<s%> also into the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> countries shall be <S%H3782>overthrown:<s%> but <S%H428>these<s%> shall <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> even <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>
He shall <S%H7971>stretch<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> also on the <S%H776>countries:<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall not <S%H6413>escape.<s%>

But he shall have <S%H4910>power<s%> over the <S%H4362>treasures<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2530>precious<s%> things of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and the <S%H3864>Libyans<s%> and the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> shall be at his <S%H4703>steps.<s%>

But <S%H8052>tidings<s%> out of the <S%H4217>east<s%> and out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H926>trouble<s%> him: therefore he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy,<s%> and utterly to make <S%H2763>away<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of his <S%H643>palace<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3220>seas<s%> in the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> yet he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H7093>end,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H5826>help<s%> him.
